body:
@minux yea sorry I probably pasted bad code. This was my 2nd try at writing the func, the first was different. Thanks for the comment, I'll write a new func.

in my defense if you swap the for loops, so idxs are the outer loop, the result is still wrong. (I think, I will check)

edit: @minux is right. whats the solution?

edit: I think my method of writing that was obviously wrong, maybe the solution is to make a function `moveIdxFront(s []int, idx int)`, and then use that:  `for _,v := range Idxs { a = moveIdxFront(a, v) }`
